nodes.text: The Arleen system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories' sector known as the Centrality, specifically in the area falling within the Slice region.

The system was the namesake of the Arleen Loop hyperlane, which connected it to the Rafa system, while the Falko Run hyperspace route linked the system to the Oseon and Ringneldia systems. The Arleen system also shared its name with the pleasure yacht Arleen.
The Arleen system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square T-8.
